change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A0 - Fixed some plot stations not being invincible

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A5 - Fixed Split Scientist message when losing testbed

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A1 - Fixed missing Teladi Bribe deduction

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A4 - Fixed missing Teladi Bribe deduction

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A3 - Fixed Beryll contact message when choosing Beryll as an ally

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A2 - Fixed race briefing steps

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A4 - Fixed incorrect Strong Arms cargo space message in Get Structural Parts mission

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A1 - Fixed various mission briefings

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A4 - Fixed an issue where TP could not be used to pick up Researchers because of built in CLS

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A1 - Fixed multiple astronauts spawned if salvage corvette destroyed

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A4 - Fixed an issue where assassination mission chains did not progess

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A2 - Fixed an issue where race was impossible to lose

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A1 - Added some additional mission objectives for clarity based on player feedback

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A6 - Fixed an issue where Mars SX and BHS MO might be still be hostile to the player

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A6 - Fixed an issue where the Xenon Kill counters would reach 0 but would not complete

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A6 - Fixed Xenon Kill counter subtraction operation

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A6 - Added some additional mission objectives for clarity based on player feedback

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A0 - Added competing faction fleets to attack player assets between A4 - A5

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A1 - Added in repercusions for using JSDD hackers

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A0 - Changed waits between acts to final versions

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A2 - Added contingencies for multiple race failures

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A4 - Fixed Jonferco TL name in station supply offer

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A0 - Fixed attacks from Ally during Faction Reprisal Scene

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A0 - Rebalanced enemy fleets during Faction Reprisal Scene

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A0 - Fixed RFF fleets battling Corp fleets in same race sectors during Faction Reprisal Scene

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A6 - Fixed mission guidiance at end of A6

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A5 - Fixed Hacking Minigame integration

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A5 - Altered mission guidance in Xenon UFJD sector for Detector integration

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A5 - Fixed Hacking Minigame integration

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A4 - Activated Xenon fighter jobs for BHS and Segaris early for ease of reputation gains

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A2 - Added check for plot critical Detector ware

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A5 - Added check for plot critical Detector ware

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A0 - Fixed missing faction attacks from Jonferco and Beryll during reprisal scene

change.author: DrBullwinkle
change.description: A5 - Balanced enemies and crates. Higher fight ranks get harder enemies.

change.author: Owen Lake
change.description: Various - Changed some add_cargo to add_equipment. Removed cues adding Detector ware at intervals. Changed some all_objects_destroyed checks to group.object.count checks

change.author: Owen Lake
change.description: Various - Removed references to SS_SH_Y_M6M

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A2 - Fixed race timer not reseting on fail

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A0 - Fixed Jonferco using Split assets in Faction Reprisal Scene

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A0 - Fixed incorrect fleet sizes for Jonferco and Beryll in Faction Reprisal Scene

change.author: DrBullwinkle
change.description: A5 - Added Hint to use satellites to detect secret crates

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A0 - Fixed formatting of some mission breifing texts

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A4 - Added restock of Spaceflies to Strong Arms HQ and Depths of Silence MO

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A2 - Fixed Stopwatch subtitle for display in other languages

change.author: eldyranx3
change.description: A0 - Added an Ion Disrupter Forge to Plot Stations
